amendment.description: To establish a special committee of the Senate to investigate the awarding and carrying out of contracts to conduct activities in Afghanistan and Iraq and to fight the war on terrorism.

action.text: Amendment SA 1670 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1670.
Motion to suspend Rule XVI with respect to amendment SA 1670 made in Senate.
Motion to suspend Rule XVI with respect to amendment SA 1670 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 228.
Amendment SA 1670 ruled out of order by the chair.
